markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Dimensional Steps](/Spells.aspx?ID=524)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 406 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 20 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You teleport to a location up to 20 feet away within your line of sight.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.
name: Dimensional Steps

text: Dimensional Steps Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 406 4.0 Cast somatic Range 20 feet --- You teleport to a location up to 20 feet away within your line of sight. --- Heightened (+1) The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.
